Public Sub New ()

summary.para: Constructs this provider to use no credentials when making a new Blob Storage .
This instance will NOT use any credential when constructing the underlying Azure.Storage.Blobs client, e.g. . This is for the purpose of either anonymous access when constructing the client.

Docs.param: SAS credential to use when constructing resources.

summary.para: Constructs this provider to use the given credential when making a new Blob Storage .

This instance will use the given when constructing the underlying Azure.Storage.Blobs client, e.g. . The credential will only be used when the provider needs to construct a client in the first place. It will not be used when creating a from a pre-existing client, e.g. . Additionally, if the given target blob resource already has a SAS token in the URI, that token will be preferred over this credential.

Public Function FromBlob (blobUri As Uri, Optional options As BlobStorageResourceOptions = Nothing) As StorageResource
member this.FromBlob : Uri * Azure.Storage.DataMovement.Blobs.BlobStorageResourceOptions -> Azure.Storage.DataMovement.StorageResource

Docs.param: Target location.

Options for creating the storage resource. You may supply a , but you may also supply type-specific options instead:
When making a destination storage resource, the corresponding blob type of the options class will be used to determine the intended blob type of the destination. If only the base options type is provided, block blob will be the default used.
Docs.summary: Creates a storage resource pointing towards the given container URI.

Docs.param: Target location.

Options for creating the storage resource. You may supply a , but you may also supply type-specific options instead:
When making a destination storage resource, the corresponding blob type of the options class will be used to determine the intended blob type of the destination. If only the base options type is provided, block blob will be the default used.
Optional to propagate notifications that the operation should be cancelled.
Docs.summary: Creates a storage resource pointing towards the given container URI.
